definition: bow string/string of musical instrument/watchspring/chord (segment of curve)/hypotenuse/CL:根[gen1]

sentences.english: Your wandering eyes pull at your lover’s heartstrings.
sentences.chinese: 你迷离的眼睛紧扣爱人的心弦。

sentences.english: The picture is more compelling with an arrow at this point.
sentences.chinese: 在这里这张图中的箭头是扣人心弦的。

sentences.english: The two finalists are well matched and it should result in a nail-biting finish to the tournament.
sentences.chinese: 两个决赛者棋鼓相当，决赛将会扣人心弦的。

sentences.english: Ms. Gillard predicted Saturday's ballot will be an 'absolute cliffhanger.'
sentences.chinese: 吉拉德预测，周六的投票毫无疑问将“扣人心弦”。

sentences.english: The sad voice sighs, the heartstring breaks.
It's just these heart-thrilling chapters that brought his work world renown.
sentences.chinese: 正因这些扣人心弦的篇章才使得他的作品举世闻名。

sentences.english: Expect another tightly plotted film from Hong Kong's master of stylish thrillers.
sentences.chinese: 期待香港这位惊悚片大师又一部扣人心弦的力作吧。

sentences.english: A sleek and glossy feel of a magazine template can really hit the right chords with a user.
sentences.chinese: 优美的杂志模板的确可以拨动用户的心弦。

sentences.english: Want in the breeze of the night to marvel, knock to open lonesome heartstring for you.
sentences.chinese: 不要在晚风中惊叹，替你敲开寂寞的心弦。

sentences.english: Or even more exciting, have you ever fallen “head over heels” in love?
sentences.chinese: 或者更加扣人心弦，“从头到脚”完全沉入其中？

sentences.english: Long be heard this roar over endless realms, in the echoing of a thousand heartstrings .
sentences.chinese: 愿这长啸之声响彻天地，在千亿心弦间久久地回荡。

sentences.english: Dreaming about being an actress, is more exciting then being one.
sentences.chinese: 作梦关于是女演员，是更加扣人心弦然后是一个。

sentences.english: The play was so gripping that the audience quickly-fied with the actors.
sentences.chinese: 那出戏如此扣人心弦，以致观众很快和演员融为一体。

sentences.english: He witnessed the impressive rites of the paschal service.
sentences.chinese: 他看到逾越节崇祀中一切动人心弦的仪式。

sentences.english: It ripples out，moreover，to the heartstrings that will tug， And always leaves an echo that is very like a hug.
sentences.chinese: 它的涟漪深深波及心弦，总会留下反响，宛若拥抱。

sentences.english: Dragon heart string, snake nerves, dinosaur eggs and firedrake blood.
sentences.chinese: 龙心弦，蛇神经，恐龙蛋和火龙血。

definition: to stir/to prod/to poke/to move sideways/to strum (on a guitar etc)
to touch/to stir up (trouble or emotions)/to move (sb's emotions or worry)
to affect/to produce a change in sth
with a sudden shock, bang etc
in the depth of one's soul
popular feeling/the will of the people
lit. as if weeping and complaining (idiom)/fig. mournful (music or singing)
